item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, January 28, 2025 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:

26. Boom Supersonic to break sound barrier during historic test flight today (42 points | 47 comments)

29. Introducing ChatGPT Gov (12 points | 3 comments)
